attributes.action: Have a National inquiry into child abuse and gang rapes
attributes.additional_details:
Since the last inquiry more cases of come to light where young girls where failed by the authorities and theirs stories need to be heard and the perpetrators brought to justice. 

I want the government to move forward with an inquiry to bring justice to the victims whereby the  perpetrators should forced to pay compensation to those victims and then be imprisoned after which there citizenship is stripped and they are deported.
attributes.background: Have a National inquiry into child abuse and gang rapes. Never mind the fact that the Prime Minister instructed his MP’s to vote it down. That is obstruction of justice in democrat and dictatorial. .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
